justification: "Expected performance was measured by asking respondents to indicate how they expected participants to perform on the task on a 7-point scale ranging from 'extremely poorly' to 'extremely well'."

measured_by: 7-point rating scale (extremely low caution – extremely high caution)
justification: "Expected caution was measured by asking respondents to indicate how cautiously they expected the hypothetical participants to respond… Caution was rated on a 7-point scale ranging from 'extremely low caution' to 'extremely high caution'."

measured_by: Response threshold parameter B of the Linear Ballistic Accumulator model
justification: "The response threshold quantifies the degree of caution. Higher thresholds reflect more caution as they require more evidence before a decision is made."

measured_by: Difference in drift rates (v_diff) between accumulators in the LBA model
justification: "The difference in the rates of evidence accumulation for the correct and incorrect response alternatives captures the efficiency of information processing."

measured_by: Mixture parameter p_guess (proportion of guess trials)
justification: "p_guess quantifies the (in)consistency in task focus for each participant."

measured_by: t0 parameter of the LBA model
justification: "The LBA also includes a non-decision time parameter (t0) that captures the component of the response time attributable to processes other than the decision process."
